lastMotion, lastRing, lcdMessage and smartDetectZone in realTimeEvents

thumbnail image for list of motion events added (base64 images)
small thumbnail image for list of motion events and real time events added (base64 images)
camera name for list of motion events added

kleines miniaturbild für die liste der bewegungsereignisse und echtzeitereignisse hinzugefügt (base64 bilder)

lastMotion, lastRing, лкд Сообщение и умный DetectZone в realTimeEvents
Кнопка, чтобы принять ручной снимок добавлен
